name: dusk-stone
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a lampent into chandelure, a misdreavus into mismagius, or a murkrow into honchkrow.
short_effect: Evolves a Lampent into Chandelure, a Misdreavus into Mismagius, or a Murkrow into Honchkrow.

species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as dark as dark can be.
